title: Context-Based Mathematical Word Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and understanding of algebraic expressions
context.additional_context: Emphasizing contextual approaches for real-life problem-solving, structured as smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can solve word problems reflecting real-life situations from vocational and daily contexts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze problem-solving processes step-by-step and document them in explanatory text format.
Learners can compare and present three or more problem-solving strategies through peer and self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
